title: Three little ducks (á ensku)
text:
One sunny day in the park there were three ducks. Then a policeman arrested them.He got complaints from people in the park that they were doing something disturbing.
When the policeman brought them to the station he talked to each duck privately.
The first duck comes in:
Policeman: OK, what´s your name?
Duck #1: I´m duck #1.
Policeman: And what were you doing in the park?
Duck #1: I was blowing bubbles
Policeman: OK, you can leave.
Then the next duck comes in:
Policeman:OK, what´s your name?
Duck #2: I´m duck #2.
Policeman: And what were you doing in the park?
Duck #1: I was blowing bubbles
Policeman: OK, you can leave.
Then the last duck comes in:
Policeman: OK, let me guess, you´re #3?
Duck: No, I´m Bubbles.

replies.text: Nei, í þessu tilfelli þýddi blow að sjúga…………………………
lol, snilld, en ég fattaði þetta nú um leið og hann talaði við duck #1, samt alger snilld.
